languages.text:
When the wielder successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} with this power sword, they immediately counter-attack with whichever attack costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. It also grants:
-<indent=5%>+30% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to parry.</indent>
-<indent=5%>On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this power sword, the target suffers a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Совершив успешное {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирование{/g} этим силовым мечом, персонаж немедленно контратакует, совершая атаку, требующую меньше всего {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}. Также происходит следующее:
-<indent=5%>+30% к парированию.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Получив {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g}, цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} −10.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
When the wielder successfully parries with this power sword, they immediately counterattack with whichever attack costs the least AP. It also grants:
-<indent=5%>+30% bonus to parry.</indent>
-<indent=5%>On a successful hit with this power sword, the target suffers a -10 penalty to WS.</indent>

Совершив успешное парирование этим силовым мечом, персонаж немедленно контратакует, совершая атаку, требующую меньше всего ОД. Также происходит следующее:

-<indent=5%>Получив попадание, цель получает штраф к Ближнему Бою −10</indent>

languages.text:
当装备者使用这把能量剑成功{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}攻击时，会立刻使用{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}消耗最低的攻击方式进行反击。此物品还会赋予以下效果：
- <indent=5%>招架{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}提高30%。</indent>
- <indent=5%>使用此能量剑{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，目标的{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}降低10点。</indent>
languages.original_text:
When the wielder successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} with this power sword, they immediately counter-attack with whichever attack costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. It also grants:
-<indent=5%>+30% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to parry.</indent>
-<indent=5%>On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this power sword, the target suffers a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
当装备者使用这把能量剑成功招架攻击时，会立刻使用{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}消耗最低的攻击方式进行反击。此物品还会赋予以下效果：
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}提高30%。{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}</indent>
- <indent=5%>使用此能量剑{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}目标时，目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}降低10点{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}。</indent>

languages.text:
使い手がこのパワーソードを使って{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}に成功すると、直ちに{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}の消費が最も少ない攻撃で反撃する。さらに次を与える：
-受け流しに<indent=5%>30%{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}増加。</indent>
-<indent=5%>このパワーソードを使って{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}した場合、ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WS{/g}への−10の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。</indent>
languages.original_text:
When the wielder successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} with this power sword, they immediately counter-attack with whichever attack costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. It also grants:
-<indent=5%>+30% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to parry.</indent>
-<indent=5%>On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this power sword, the target suffers a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
受け流しに成功すると、直ちに{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}の消費が最も少ない攻撃でカンター攻撃。さらに次の効果を付与：
・{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}に<indent=5%>+30%{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}増加</indent>
・<indent=5%>パワーソードを使って{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}した場合、ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WS{/g}に{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}-10</indent>を付与

languages.text:
Si el portador consigue realizar una {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} con esta espada de energía, contraatacará inmediatamente con el ataque que cueste menos {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. También otorga lo siguiente:
-<indent=5%>+30 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de parada.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Al acertar un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} con esta espada de energía, el objetivo sufre una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −10 a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}.</indent>
languages.original_text:
When the wielder successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} with this power sword, they immediately counter-attack with whichever attack costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. It also grants:
-<indent=5%>+30% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to parry.</indent>
-<indent=5%>On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this power sword, the target suffers a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Si el portador consigue realizar una parada con esta espada de energía, contraatacará inmediatamente con el ataque que cueste menos {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. También otorga lo siguiente:
-<indent=5%>+30 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Al acertar un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} con esta espada de energía, el objetivo sufre una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de -10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}HA{/g}.</indent>

languages.text:
Wenn der Träger der Waffe erfolgreich mit diesem Energieschwert {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pariert{/g}, führt er augenblicklich einen Gegenangriff aus, der ihn die wenigsten {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} kostet. Gewährt außerdem:
-<indent=5%>+30 % {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf Parieren.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Durch einen {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} mit diesem Energieschwert erleidet das Ziel einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −10 auf die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g}.</indent>
languages.original_text:
When the wielder successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} with this power sword, they immediately counter-attack with whichever attack costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. It also grants:
-<indent=5%>+30% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to parry.</indent>
-<indent=5%>On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this power sword, the target suffers a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Wann immer der Waffenführer erfolgreich mit diesem Energieschwert pariert, führt er augenblicklich einen Gegenangriff aus, der ihn die wenigsten {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} kostet. Gewährt außerdem:
-<indent=5%>+30 % {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Durch einen {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffer{/g} mit diesem Energieschwert erleidet das Ziel einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -10 auf die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WF{/g}.</indent>

languages.text:
Lorsque l'utilisateur réussit à {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parer{/g} avec cette épée énergétique, il contre-attaque immédiatement avec l'attaque qui coûte le moins de {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. Cette épée confère également :
-<indent=5%>+30 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de parade.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Après un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} porté avec cette épée énergétique, la cible subit une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} de −10.</indent>
languages.original_text:
When the wielder successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} with this power sword, they immediately counter-attack with whichever attack costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. It also grants:
-<indent=5%>+30% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to parry.</indent>
-<indent=5%>On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this power sword, the target suffers a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Lorsque l'utilisateur réussit à {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parer{/g} avec cette épée énergétique, il contre-attaque immédiatement avec l'attaque qui coûte le moins de {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. Cette épée confère également :
-<indent=5%>+30 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de parade.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Après un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} porté avec cette épée énergétique, la cible subit une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} de −10.</indent>

languages.text:
Kullanan kişi, bu güç kılıcıyla başarılı bir {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} yaptığında en az {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} harcayan saldırıyla anında karşı saldırı yapar. Ayrıca şunları kazandırır:
-<indent=5%>Savuşturmaya +%30 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Bu güç kılıcıyla başarılı bir {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruşta{/g} hedef, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} niteliğine −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanı{/g} alır.</indent>
languages.original_text:
When the wielder successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} with this power sword, they immediately counter-attack with whichever attack costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. It also grants:
-<indent=5%>+30% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to parry.</indent>
-<indent=5%>On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this power sword, the target suffers a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}.</indent>
